'''''Minecraft x Angry Birds''''' is a merchandise collaboration between {{MC}} and the ''{{Wikipedia|Angry Birds}}'' franchise.

== Marketplace releases ==
[[File:Angry Birds map.jpg|thumb|Key art for the map]]

=== Angry Birds ===
{{Main|Angry Birds (map)}}
Released on April 26, 2022, ''Angry Birds'' is a DLC map based on the franchise of the same name. The map concerns a conflict between the Angry Birds and Bad Piggies, with several different birds being playable over the course of the story, each with unique abilities. Included in the map are ten skins based off the ''{{wikipedia|Angry Birds: Summer Madness}}'' television series, featuring both existing characters and new ones made for the program.

=== Angry Birds Pack ===
{{Main|Content bundles}}
Continuing off the release of the DLC world, the Angry Birds Pack is a content bundle featuring it, eight [[Character Creator|character creator]] items, and {{Minecoin|1720}}.

== Trivia ==
* Prior to the announcement of ''{{Wikipedia|The Angry Birds Movie 3}}'', an article on [[Minecraft.net]] would allude to its existence, claiming it was releasing in Summer 2022. It would later be corrected.<ref>{{Mcnet|angry-birds-swoops-minecraft|Angry Birds swoops into Minecraft|May 17, 2022|[[Sophie Austin]]|archive-time=1|archive=1}}</ref>
